channel.title: Hey there!! This is Rishav Mishra on Rishav Kumar Mishra
channel.description: Recent content in Hey there!! This is Rishav Mishra on Rishav Kumar Mishra

item.title: Project 1: Project Gold
item.description: Created a webscrapping program which get data of gold as per estimated Dates. Scraped over 10 years of Gold Data. As included in Project Feature Engineering is being performed over the scrapped data. Build model over the Data using normal Linear Regression. Shown Statistical view of the Data Scrapped as for the customer or for the stakeholders. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: IPL Analysis
item.description: This is analysis of IPL matches held in India till year 2019. This dataset contains information about the analysis and too much deatils of the matches, winners and many more. Link to GitHub Repository
